name: Fix My Car LITE
description:
Have you ever wanted to fix-up a car? Complete one classic car while attending to over 30 odd-jobs by discovering parts, solving car issues, and using objects you find throughout the garage to fix your car.

This is FireRabbit's ORIGINAL Fix My Car game! This game combines the Room Escape and Hidden Objects styles into one great experience. You'll find it really entertaining even if you don't know a thing about cars. As for your game progress, the game will auto-save your every move so you can always undo a step or take a break.

Please do not spoil the fun for others by posting puzzle solutions in the comments. Instead, come and find us (FireRabbit) to ask for help.

FEATURES:

+ 30 objectives and upgrades to complete!

+ Dozens of tools and cool after-market parts to find and install!

+ Perform dozens of jobs ranging from basic routine maintenance to outrageous performance mods!

+ Explore cool environments!

+ Built-in hint system so you never get stuck!

+ All hints and objectives available in FULL version, LITE version requires unlocking with reward videos or a one-time in app purchase
